--- title: Chitra keywords: fastai sidebar: home_sidebar summary: "Library for creating data input pipeline in pure Tensorflow 2.x" ---

Install¶

pip install chitra

How to use¶

Loading data for image classification¶

import tensorflow as tf
import chitra
from chitra.dataloader import Clf, show_batch
